
## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [browserContextId](./puppeteer.protocol.browser.setpermissionrequest.browsercontextid.md) | [BrowserContextID](./puppeteer.protocol.browser.browsercontextid.md) | Context to override. When omitted, default browser context is used. |
